top_comment.text:
Hi all, love the videos!! Quick question: what is caster sugar and why is 
it special?
Thanks!!﻿
top_comment.author: Messy Kitchen, Happy Belly

comments.text:
Caster sugar is more fine than regular granulated sugar but not as fine as 
powdered sugar. I hope that helps!
comments.author: Isabel Protomartir

top_comment.text: I'm unsure whether I should have the crush I now have on these boys.﻿
top_comment.author: Lammington2

comments.text:
My dear, you are not alone.

Ben's face. Enough said.
comments.author: Kayla De Medeiros

comments.text:
How is it possible not to have? ;) I think they are so entertaining, funny 
and I really like what they produce ´:D
comments.author: SmilyLily1996
